functions-question2_key2: Write a function named function_print_lines which takes 2 strings, and prints them in the following manner.
functions-question2_key3:
If we give these 2 arguments - "My name is Rishabh." and "I am the co-founder of NavGurukul"
we will get the following output:
functions-question2_key4:
# write your function here

# -output
# My name is Rishabh..
# I am the co-founder of NavGurukul.
functions-question2_key7:
My name is Rishabh
I am the co-founder of Nav Gurukul
